verses.text: Praise ye the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**. Praise the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, O my soul.+ 146.1 Praise yeâ€¦: Heb. Hallelujah*
While I live will I praise the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
Put not your trust in princes, nor* in the son of man, in whom there is* no help.+ 146.3 help: or, salvation*
His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
Happy is he* that hath* the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is* in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** his God:
Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is:* which keepeth truth for ever:
Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** looseth the prisoners:
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** openeth the eyes of* the blind: the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** raiseth them that are bowed down: the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** loveth the righteous:
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall reign for ever, even* thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**.
